text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the Charles County Gaming Permit Review Board.
"County commissioners" means the Board of County Commissioners of Charles County.

section.section: "Gaming device" means a mechanism for playing a game of chance.
"Gaming device" includes a paddle wheel, wheel of fortune, and chance book.
"Gaming device" does not include bingo, a slot machine, or other gaming device that is otherwise regulated by State law.
"Gaming event" means an event involving a game of chance.

"Gaming event" includes:
a carnival;
a bazaar; and
a raffle involving prizes of cash exceeding $1,000 or merchandise with a cash equivalent exceeding $1,000.

text.section: "Gaming permit" means a permit to operate a gaming device at a gaming event that the county commissioners issue under this subtitle.
"Person" includes a joint interest held by two or more persons.

"Representative" means a person who has been a bona fide member of a fundraising organization or educational organization for at least 1 year before the date of a gaming permit application by the fundraising organization or educational organization.
